title: WATCH: Newcastle goalkeeper Karl Darlow scores late own goal
description: Karl Darlow did not know much about the own goal which cost Newcastle two points against Burnley.
content:
The Newcastle goalkeeper had made a good save from a point-blank Sam Vokes header but then the ball struck the bar and hit Darlow on the back of the head and went into the back of the net.
The goal cancelled out Jamaal Lascelles' opener, meaning the game ended 1-1, leaving Newcastle just a point above the relegation zone.
Hit the video above to see the own goal
